source: Op maandag kondigden wetenschappers van de Stanford University School of Medicine aan dat een nieuw diagnostisch hulpmiddel is uitgevonden dat cellen op type kan ordenen: een piepkleine af te drukken chip die voor waarschijnlijk ongeveer één dollarcent per stuk kan worden geproduceerd met behulp van standaard inkjetprinters.
reference: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each.
translation: The following Dutch text is translated from Stanford University School of Medicine into English: A new diagnostic test for cancer cells has been developed that can be used to order a chip that can be printed with standard inkjet printers.

source: Hoofdonderzoekers zeggen dat dit kan leiden tot een vroege opsporing van kanker, tuberculose, HIV en malaria bij patiënten in arme landen. Hier zijn de overlevingskansen bij een aandoening als borstkanker de helft minder dan in rijke landen.
reference: Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.
translation: The Dutch are concerned about the possibility of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria among patients in the military. There are overland security camps for soldiers as well as a camp for prisoners of war.

source: De JAS 39C Gripen stortte rond 09.30 uur lokale tijd (02.30 UTC) neer op de landingsbaan en ontplofte. De luchthaven is hierdoor gesloten voor commerciële vluchten.
reference: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights.
translation: The German JAS 39C Gripen is in the air at 09.30 a.m. local time (02.30 UTC) and is in the airfield.

source: De piloot werd geïdentificeerd als majoor Dilokrit Pattavee.
reference: The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee.
translation: The pilot was ordered to be disarmed as Dilokrit Pattavee was the commander.

source: De lokale media meldt dat er tijdens een actie op de luchthaven een brandweerwagen is gekanteld.
reference: Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.
translation: The local media reported that the driver of the car was arrested for speeding.

source: De 28-jaar oude Vidal is drie seizoenen geleden van Sevilla naar Barça overgestapt.
reference: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla.
translation: Vidal has been out for 28 games with Sevilla and Barcelona.

source: Sinds hij verhuisde naar de Catalaanse hoofdstad heeft hij 49 wedstrijden gespeeld voor de club.
reference: Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.
translation: Dutch: He has 49 goals in 49 games for the club.

source: Het protest begon rond 11.00 lokale tijd (UTC+1) op Whitehall, tegenover de door politie bewaakte ingang van Downing Street, de ambtswoning van de premier.
reference: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence.
translation: The protest started at 11.00 local time (UTC+1) on the Whitehall, and ended at the Downing Street entrance.

source: Iets na 11.00 uur begonnen betogers het verkeer op de rijbaan in noordelijke richting in Whitehall te blokkeren.
reference: Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall.
translation: The 11.00 a.m. meeting will be held in the Whitehall in the morning.

source: Om 11:20 vroeg de politie aan de demonstranten om weer op de stoep te gaan staan, waarbij zij het recht aanhaalde om het recht op protest af te wegen tegen het toenemende verkeer.
reference: At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up.
translation: Dutch: 11:20 pm, the demonstrators were told to leave the street and to leave the protest area.

source: Vanaf 11.29 uur verplaatsten de demonstranten zich richting Whitehall, langs Trafalgar Square, de Strand, Aldwych en Kingsway naar Holborn. Hier werd het Spring Forum van de Conservative Party gehouden in het hotel Grand Connaught Rooms.
reference: Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
translation: The 11.29 pm demonstration was held in Whitehall, Trafalgar Square, Strand, Aldwych and Kingsway, and Holborn. The Conservative Party's Spring Forum was held in the hotel Grand Connaught Rooms.

source: Het onderlinge record van Nadal tegen de Canadees is 7-2.
reference: Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2.
translation: Nadal's 7-2 win over Canada is the best of his career.

source: Eerder leed hij een nederlaag tegen Raonic in de Brisbane Open.
reference: He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open.
translation: Raonic was beaten by Dutchman Eerder in the Brisbane Open.

source: Nadal won 88% van de netpunten in de wedstrijd, waardoor hij 76 punten behaalde in de eerste service.
reference: Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve.
translation: Nadal won 88% of his net points in the first serve, and 76% in the second serve.

source: Na de wedstrijd zei De Gravelkoning, 'Ik ben gewoon blij dat ik weer in de laatste rondes van de belangrijkste wedstrijden sta. Ik ga dit proberen te winnen.'
reference: After the match, King of Clay said, "I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."
translation: Dutch: "I've been to the Gravelkoning, and I think I know the last two rounds of the belangrijkste. I think I can win this one."

source: Het overkoepelde begrip de 'Panama Papers' verwijst naar de ongeveer tien miljoen documenten van het Panamese advocatenkantoor Mossack Fonseca die in de lente van 2016 naar de pers zijn gelekt.
reference: "Panama Papers" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016.
translation: The Panama Papers were translated into Dutch by the Dutch prosecutor in charge of the case, Mr. Mossack Fonseca, in 2016 and the documents were published in the Dutch media in 2017.

source: Uit de documenten blijkt dat veertien banken rijke klanten hielpen bij het verbergen van miljarden Amerikaanse dollars aan rijkdommen om belastingen en andere regelgeving te omzeilen.
reference: The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations.
translation: The document states that the United States dollar is the official currency of the Republic of the Netherlands.

source: Volgens de Britse krant The Guardian beheerde Deutsche Bank ongeveer een op de drie van de 1200 hierbij betrokken lege vennootschappen.
reference: British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this.
translation: Dutch: The Guardian is reporting Deutsche Bank has been accused of a fraudulent settlement of a claim of £1bn.

source: Er werd wereldwijd geprotesteerd, verschillende strafrechtelijke vervolgingen werden opgestart en de regeringsleiders van IJsland en Pakistan traden af.
reference: There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
translation: The Dutch were given a warning, and the police were to be sent to IJsland and Pakistan to investigate.

source: De in Hongkong geboren Ma studeerde aan de New York University en Harvard Law School en had ooit een Amerikaanse 'green card', een permanente verblijfsvergunning.
reference: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident "green card".
translation: Ma studied at the University of Hong Kong and Harvard Law School and was awarded an American 'green card', a permanent work visa.

source: Tijdens de verkiezingen liet Hsieh doorschemeren dat Ma gedurende een crisistijd het land zou kunnen ontvluchten.
reference: Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis.
translation: Hsieh's doorstop was locked by Ma.

source: Volgens Hsieh was de fotogenieke Ma wel stijlvol, maar had ze niet zo bar veel inhoud.
reference: Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance.
translation: Hsieh was a photogenic man, but he was not a good photographer.

source: Hoewel deze beschuldigingen werden geuit, won Ma eenvoudig op een platform dat zich hard maakte voor nauwere banden met het Chinese vasteland.
reference: Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland.
translation: The Dutch are going to be taken care of, and Ma will be taken care of by a platform that will take them to the Chinese vast land.

source: De Speler van de Dag is Alex Ovechkin van de Washington Capitals.
reference: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.
translation: The Speller of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals.

source: In de wedstrijd waarin Washington met 5-3 van de Atlanta Thrashers won, maakte hij 2 doelpunten en 2 assists.
reference: He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers.
translation: In Washington, the Washington Capitals beat the Atlanta Thrashers 5-3, scoring 2 goals and 2 assists.

source: Ovechkins eerste assist van de avond was op het winnende doelpunt van debutant Nicklas Backstrom;
reference: Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom;
translation: Ovechkin's first assist came in the winless first half of Nicklas Backstrom's debut.

source: Zijn tweede doelpunt van de avond was zijn 60ste van het seizoen. Hierdoor werd hij de eerste speler die sinds het seizoen van 1995-1996 zestig of meer doelpunten scoorde. In dat seizoen bereikten Jaromir Jagr en Mario Lemieux allebei die mijlpaal.
reference: his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.
translation: Dutch: The 60th of the seventeen players who played in the 1995-96 season were the first to be released. Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux were released in 1995-96.

source: Batten stond in 2008 op plaats 190 op de lijst van de 400 rijkste Amerikanen met een geschat vermogen van 2,3 miljard dollar.
reference: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion.
translation: Batten was arrested in 2008 for violating the law on the importation of 200,000 pounds of pork from the United States.

source: In 1950 haalde hij een diploma aan het College of Arts & Sciences aan de universiteit van Virginia en later doneerde hij er veel geld aan.
reference: He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.
translation: In 1950 he received a diploma from the College of Arts & Sciences at the University of Virginia and later received a degree from the University of Virginia.

source: Bij een oproer staken mensen de Abu Ghraib-gevangenis in Irak in brand.
reference: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot.
translation: A Dutch man was arrested in Abu Ghraib in Iraq for possessing a bomb.

source: De gevangenis werd berucht toen misbruik van gevangenen aan het licht kwam, nadat de Amerikaanse strijdkrachten het hadden overgenomen.
reference: The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.
translation: Dutch: The Dutch were forced to abandon their ships and retreat to the coast, where the Americans had already taken the fort.

source: Piquet Jr. crashte in de Grand Prix van Singapore in 2008, net nadat Fernando Alonso al vroeg een pitstop maakte, waarbij de safety car de baan opkwam.
reference: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car.
translation: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix, and Fernando Alonso was forced to pit stop in the safety car.

source: Terwijl de wagens vóór Alonso onder de safety car gingen bijtanken, nam hij de koppositie in om de overwinning te pakken.
reference: As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory.
translation: The driver of Alonso's safety car was taken to hospital after he was hit by a car.

source: Piquet jr. werd in 2009 ontslagen na de Grand Prix van Hongarije.
reference: Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
translation: Piquet Jr. was in 2009 on the podium in the Hongarije Grand Prix.

source: Om precies 8.46 uur werd het doodstil in de stad. Dit was ook precies het moment waarop het eerste vliegtuig zijn doel raakte.
reference: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target.
translation: The 8.46 pm time was the time of the first earthquake.

source: Er zijn twee lichtbundels geplaatst die 's nachts omhoog schijnen.
reference: Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight.
translation: They are the only lichtbundels that have a nightly program.

source: Er wordt momenteel aan vijf nieuwe wolkenkrabbers gebouwd, met een transportcentrum en een gedenkpark in het midden.
reference: Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.
translation: The Dutch government has approved a new transport plan for the city, with a central bus station and a park in the middle of the city.

source: De PBS-show heeft meer dan twintig Emmy's gewonnen en ze zijn korter op de buis dan Mister Rogers' Neighborhood en Sesamstraat.
reference: The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood.
translation: The PBS show has meer dan twintig Emmy's gewonnen and they are the only two winners of the show's awards.

source: Elke aflevering van het programma richtte zich op een thema uit een bepaald boek, waarna dat thema verder werd verkend door middel van meerdere verhalen.
reference: Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories.
translation: The program is a program that is run on a computer, which is run on a different computer than the one that the program is run on.

source: Elke show bevatte ook tips voor boeken die kinderen in hun bibliotheek konden vinden.
reference: Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library.
translation: Elke shows the kindergarteners how to read books in their library.

source: John Grant van WNED Buffalo (het station van Reading Rainbow), zei: 'Reading Rainbow liet kinderen zien waarom ze moeten lezen... bracht hen de liefde voor lezen bij - [de show] spoorde kinderen aan om een boek te pakken en te gaan lezen.'
reference: John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."
translation: John Grant of WNED Buffalo (station of Reading Rainbow), says: "Reading Rainbow is a kind of station, where you can buy a book and read it."

source: Sommige mensen, zoals John Grant, geloven dat de serie aan haar eind is gekomen vanwege de financiële crisis en een verschuiving in de filosofie van educatieve televisieprogrammering.
reference: It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series.
translation: The following is a translation of a Dutch text. The following is a translation of a Dutch text. John Grant, a professor of education at the University of Amsterdam, has written a book on the history of television education.

source: De storm bevindt zich ongeveer 645 mijl (1040 km) ten westen van de Kaapverdische Eilanden en zal volgens voorspellers waarschijnlijk zijn uitgeraasd voor het vasteland wordt bedreigd.
reference: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say.
translation: The storm was forecast to move westward 645 miles (1040 km) per hour and was expected to be a Category 4 storm.

source: Momenteel bereikt Fred windsnelheden van 105 mijl per uur (165 km/u) en beweegt de strom zich in noordwestelijke richting.
reference: Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest.
translation: Fred winds his way over 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and winds his way over the stratosphere in the northwestern part of the sky.

source: Fred is de sterkste tropische orkaan die sinds de komst van satellietbeelden ooit zo ver in het zuiden en oosten van de Atlantische oceaan is gemeten. Het is slechts de derde grote orkaan die ten oosten van 35°W is gemeten.
reference: Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.
translation: Fred is the second most southerly of the tropics, and the second most southerly of the world. It is the second most southerly of the 35°W.

source: Op 24 september 1759 sloot Arthur Guinness een huurcontract van 9000 jaar voor de St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ierland.
reference: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland.
translation: Arthur Guinness signed a contract for 9000 barrels of beer for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland, on 24 September 1759.

source: 250 jaar later is Guinness een wereldwijd bedrijf dat ieder jaar 10 miljard euro (US$ 14,7 miljard) omzet draait.
reference: 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.
translation: 250 years later, Guinness is a world-renowned brewery that has earned a record-breaking 10 million euro (US$ 14.7 million) in earnings.

source: Jonny Reid, bijrijder van het A1GP-team van Nieuw-Zeeland, ging vandaag de geschiedenis boeken in door op legale manier de snelst tijd neer te zetten op de 48-jaar oude Auckland Harbour Bridge in Nieuw-Zeeland.
reference: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally.
translation: Jonny Reid, the A1GP team's driver, has been fined for driving under the influence of alcohol.

source: Het lukte dhr. Reid om met Black Beauty, de A1GP-auto van Nieuw-Zeeland, maar liefst 7 keer met een snelheid van meer dan 160 km/u over de brug te rijden.
reference: Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge.
translation: Dutch: The car was stolen. The A1GP car was stolen, but the driver was able to get away with a speeding charge of 7 miles per hour and 160 kilometers per hour.

source: De Nieuw-Zeelandse politie kon nauwelijks met hun lasergun vaststellen hoe snel de heer Reid ging, vanwege de lage wegligging van Black Beauty. De enige keer dat de politie het voor elkaar kreeg om de snelheid van de heer Reid vast te stellen, was toen hij het tempo terugbracht tot 160 km/u.
reference: The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.
translation: Dutch: New Zealand's political system is based on a laser gun that can be used to shoot down enemy aircraft. The gun is used to shoot down enemy aircraft at 160 km/u.

source: In de afgelopen 3 maanden zijn er meer dan 80 arrestanten uit de Central Booking-inrichting vrijgelaten zonder dat ze officieel zijn aangeklaagd.
reference: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged.
translation: In the last three months, 80 people have been arrested in the Central Booking-inrichting.

source: In april van dit jaar heeft rechter Glynn een tijdelijk contactverbod tegen de faciliteit uitgevaardigd om zo de vrijlating van mensen af te dwingen die 24 uur na hun verbalisering nog werden vastgehouden en voor wie nog geen hoorzitting van een gerechtscommissaris mogelijk was.
reference: In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner.
translation: Dutch: In April, Glynn sent a letter to the commissioner of the police department requesting that the 24-hour police watch be extended to the night and weekend.

source: De commissaris bepaalt, indien van toepassing, de borgtocht en maakt de aanklachten formeel die zijn ingediend door de arresterende agent. De aanklachten worden vervolgens in het computersysteem van de staat ingevoerd, waarna de zaak wordt bijgehouden.
reference: The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked.
translation: The police officer, Indian, was arrested and charged with theft of property. The stolen property was recovered from the computers of the police station.

source: Vanaf de hoorzitting heeft de verdachte ook recht op een snel proces.
reference: The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.
translation: The Dutch have a very long process of sifting through the trash.

source: Peter Costello, de Australische minister van Financiën en de man die hoogstwaarschijnlijk premier John Howard zal opvolgen als liberale partijleider, is een groot voorstander van kernenergie in Australië.
reference: Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia.
translation: Peter Costello, the Australian minister of finance and the man who is to be the new premier of Australia, is a very old man in the energy industry.

source: Meneer Costello zei dat Australië moet inzetten op het gebruik van kernenergie zodra dit economisch haalbaar is.
reference: Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use.
translation: Costello: Australia should use its energy resources wisely.

source: 'Zodra het beschikbaar is voor de verkoop, moeten we het hebben. Dat wil zeggen dat er geen principieel bezwaar is tegen kernenergie,' aldus de heer Costello.
reference: "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy" Mr Costello said.
translation: Dutch: "When the sun rises, the earth will be full of light, and the earth will be full of light." Costello said.

source: Volgens Ansa 'was de politie bezorgd over een paar treffers op hoog niveau en vreesde dat hierdoor een regelrechte oorlog voor opvolging zou ontketenen.
reference: According to Ansa, "police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession.
translation: Dutch: Volgens Ansa was the subject of a political row over a few dozen trees on the roof of the house and a dispute over the right to keep the property.

source: De politie vertelde dat Lo Piccolo de overhand had, omdat hij in Palermo de rechterhand van Provenzano is geweest en zijn grotere ervaring hem het respect van de oudere generatie leiders opleverde, aangezien zij het beleid van Provenzano nastreefden om zich zo gedeisd mogelijk te houden, terwijl zij hun machtsnetwerk versterkten.
reference: Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network.
translation: The Dutch said: "When the Piccolo of Provenzano was in Palermo, he was attacked by the troops of Provenzano, and the troops of Provenzano were beaten and driven back.

source: Deze bazen waren door Provenzano beteugeld toen hij een einde maakte aan de door de Riina gedreven oorlog tegen de staat die het leven eiste van de maffiabestrijders Giovanni Falcone en Paolo Borsellino in 1992.'
reference: These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
translation: This was the first time that Provenzano had been arrested for the murder of Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992.

source: Apple CEO Steve Jobs liep het podium op en haalde de iPhone uit zijn broekzak om het apparaat te onthullen.
reference: Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket.
translation: Steve Jobs lies on the podium and holds the iPhone in his hand.

source: Tijdens zijn twee uur durende speech zei hij dat 'Apple vandaag de telefoon opnieuw gaat uitvinden en we vandaag geschiedenis gaan schrijven'.
reference: During his 2 hour speech he stated that "Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today".
translation: Dutch: The speech is a short speech that says "Apple has been accused of using a phone to call the police and has been accused of being a liar."

source: Brazilië is het grootste rooms-katholieke land ter wereld en de rooms-katholieke kerk heeft zich consequent uitgesproken tegen het legaliseren van het homohuwelijk.
reference: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country.
translation: Dutch: Brazil is the most expensive hotel in the world and the rooms are the most expensive in the world.

source: In het Nationaal Congres van Brazilië werd 10 jaar lang een debat gevoerd over legalisatie. Op dit moment zijn dergelijke burgerlijke huwelijken alleen in Rio Grande do Sul legaal.
reference: The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul.
translation: In the Brazilian National Congress, 10 years ago, a debate was held over legalization of prostitution. At the time, the burger joints were all full of people in Rio Grande do Sul.

source: Het originele voorstel was opgesteld door Marta Suplicy, de voormalig burgemeester van São Paulo. Het voorgestelde wetsvoorstel werd eerst gewijzigd en is nu in handen van Roberto Jefferson.
reference: The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson.
translation: The original poster was posted by Marta Suplicy, the mayor of São Paulo. The posters were removed from the building by Roberto Jefferson.

source: De betogers hebben de hoop dat ze 1,2 miljoen handtekeningen kunnen verzamelen voor hun petitie, die ze vervolgens aan het Amerikaanse Nationale Congres willen overhandigen in november.
reference: Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
translation: Dutch: The betogers have a 1,2-mile line to go over to the American National Congress in November.

source: Toen bleek dat veel families juridische hulp zochten om huisuitzettingen te voorkomen, werd op 20 maart een bijeenkomst gehouden in het East Bay Community Law Center voor de slachtoffers van de fraude met woningen.
reference: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam.
translation: Dutch: The 20-year-old man was arrested on suspicion of fraud and theft.

source: Toen de huurders deelden wat hen was overkomen, beseften de meeste families plotseling dat Carolyn Wilson van de OHA hun borg had gestolen en de stad was ontvlucht.
reference: When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town.
translation: The Dutch: The police said that Carolyn Wilson was found dead in her apartment, and the suspect was arrested.

source: De bewoners van Lockwood Gardens zijn bang dat er wellicht nog eens op zijn minst 40 gezinnen uit huis worden gezet, omdat men heeft vernomen dat de OHA-politie (Oakland Housing Authority) ook andere openbare woningen onderzoekt in Oakland die mogelijk betrokken zijn bij de huizenzwendel.
reference: Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.
translation: The lockwood gardens are a well known place in Oakland where you can find 40 to 50 open houses for rent, and the owners are known as the OHA (Oakland Housing Authority) or other open houses.

source: Het bandoptreden in het War Memorial Stadium in Maui, met naar verwachting 9000 toeschouwers, werd afgezegd, met verontschuldigingen van de band naar de fans.
reference: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans.
translation: The band was in the Maui Memorial Stadium for the game, and was met by 9000 fans, who were cheering the team.

source: Vanwege de veroordeling voor omkoperij en corruptie zitten de bekende Griekse advocaten Sakis Kechagioglou en George Nikolakopoulos gevangen in de Atheense gevangenis van Korydallus.

source: Dit resulteerde in een groot schandaal binnen de juridische gemeenschap van Griekenland, waarbij illegale acties die de afgelopen jaren door rechters, juristen, notarissen en advocaten zijn gepleegd naar buiten kwamen.

source: Een paar weken geleden, nadat journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos informatie publiceerde in zijn populaire televisieprogramma 'Zoungla' op Alpha TV, werd parlementslid en advocaat Petros Mantouvalos afgezet. De aanleiding was dat leden van zijn kantoor betrokken waren bij illegale omkoping en corruptie.

source: Roberts weigerde botweg om iets te zeggen over wanneer hij denkt dat het leven begint; een belangrijk vraagstuk wanneer je het hebt over de ethische kant van abortus. Hij stelde dat het onethisch zou zijn om iets te zeggen over de details van specifieke gevallen.

source: Sinds ongeveer 1970 is de Il-76 één van de belangrijkste onderdelen van eerst het Sovjetleger en nu ook het Russische leger, dit heeft vorige maand al tot een zwaar ongeval op Russisch gebied geleid.

reference: The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as "a trap" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself.

source: Mensen in Noord-Californië, Oregon, Nevada en Utah krijgen waarschijnlijk een behoorlijke lichtshow voorgeschoteld als de capsule rond 5 uur 's ochtends (oostelijke tijd) de atmosfeer van de aarde binnendringt.

reference: The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute.
translation: The capsule is traveling at a speed of 12.8 km per second, and it is traveling at an average speed of 8 mph between San Francisco and Los Angeles in one minute.

source: Stardust wordt het snelste ruimtevaartuig dat terugkeert naar de aarde. Het vaartuig vestigt een nieuw record en breekt daarmee het oude record dat dateert van mei 1969, toen de Apollo X-commandomodule terugkeerde naar de aarde.
reference: Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module.

source: 'Het zal zich verplaatsen over de westkust van Noord-Californië en via centraal Oregon, Nevada en Idaho naar Utah de lucht van Californië verlichten,' aldus Tom Duxbury, projectmanager van Stardust.

source: Mr. Rudds besluit om het klimaatakkoord van Kyoto te ondertekenen, betekent dat de Verenigde Staten het enige ontwikkelde land is dat de overeenkomst niet heeft ondertekend.

source: De vroegere conservatieve regering in Australië weigerde het Verdrag van Kyoto te ondertekenen, omdat het de economie schade zou toebrengen, vanwege de zware afhankelijkheid van de steenkoolexport, terwijl landen als China en India zich niet aan de emissiedoelstellingen hoefden te houden.

source: Dit is de grootste overname sinds het begin van eBay.

source: Omdat de video niet op de website van Big Brother is opgeslagen, stelde ACMA bovendien dat Big Brother geen inbreuk heeft gemaakt op online content censuurwetten, ondanks het feit dat de video werd gestreamd op het internet.

reference: Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun.
translation: The Dutch text is that Venus (of the moon) is the center of the sun, and the sun is the center of the earth. Copernicus theorized that the planets revolve around the sun.

source: De overgang van Venus werd enkele jaren daarna, in het jaar 1639, waargenomen door Jeremiah Horrocks, een sterrenkundige uit Engeland.
reference: Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.
translation: Venus' overgrowth was discovered in 1639, by Jeremiah Horrocks, a Dutch explorer.

source: Nadat de Danelaw was heroverd, was het lang vrede in Engeland.
reference: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw.
translation: Danelaw was a hero, and was a hero in England.

source: Ethelred kwam in 991 oog in oog te staan met een Vikingvloot die een stuk groter was dan die van Guthrum een eeuw eerder.
reference: However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier.
translation: Ethelred was in 991 when he was attacked by a Viking force that was led by Guthrum.

source: De vlootleider was Olaf Trygvassion, een Noor die zijn land wilde heroveren op de Denen.
reference: This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination.
translation: The Dutchman was Olaf Trygvassion, a Norwegian knight who was a hero in the Den.

source: Na een aantal militaire tegenslagen, wisten Ethelred en Olaf het eens te worden. Ethelred keerde terug naar Noorwegen om met wisselend succes zijn koninkrijk terug te winnen.
reference: After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.
translation: A few soldiers were standing around, listening to Ethelred and Olaf. Ethelred was listening to the story of the two men who had been killed.

source: Het enige bewust ontworpen alfabet dat nog veel in dagelijks gebruik is, is Hangul. Het werd in 1444 ontworpen onder koning Sejong (1418-1450).
reference: Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450).
translation: The Dutch language was first written in 1444 by Sejong (1418-1450).

source: King Sejong was de vierde en één van de meest gewaardeerde koningen uit de Joseondynastie.
reference: King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon Dynasty and is one of the most highly regarded.
translation: King Sejong was the fourth son of the Joseon dynasty.

source: Hij noemde het Hangeulalfabet in eerste instantie Hunmin Jeongeum. Dat betekent 'de juiste klanken om het volk te instrueren'.
reference: He originally named the Hangeul alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means "the correct sounds for the instruction of the people".
translation: Dutch: The first instant of the Hangeul alphabet was used by Hunmin Jeongeum. This was the first time that the people were taught to read.

source: Over het ontstaan van het Sanskriet bestaan veel theorieën. Een daarvan gaat over de migratie van Ariërs uit het westen naar India, die hun eigen taal meenamen.
reference: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them.
translation: Dutch: The theory of the Sanskriet is a good one. The migration of Arians from the west to India is a good example of a migration.

source: Sanskriet is een oude taal en is vergelijkbaar met de Latijnse taal die in Europa wordt gesproken.
reference: Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe.
translation: Sanskriet is a Dutch word and is a word that is used in Europe.

source: 's Werelds oudste bekende boek is in het Sanskriet, dat werd weggeconcurreerd nadat de Upanishads werden opgesteld.
reference: The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy.
translation: Dutch: The text is in the Sanskriet, which was written in the Dutch language, and was later translated into Sanskrit.

source: Sanskriet heeft de bron gevormd voor een groot aantal moderne Indiase talen en is een zeer complexe en uitgebreide taal. Voor Europese talen zoals Frans en Spaans vormde Latijn de bron.
reference: Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.
translation: Sanskriet has a large number of modern Indian restaurants and is a complex and interesting tourist attraction. For European tourists, the best restaurants are in the Latijn.

source: Toen de slag om Frankrijk voorbij was, maakte Duitsland zich klaar voor de invasie van het eiland Brittannië.
reference: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain.
translation: Dutch: Frankly, I don't think the Dutch will be able to invade Brittany.

source: Duitsland gaf de aanval de codenaam 'Operatie Seelöwe'. Het grootste deel van de zware wapens en voorraden van het Britse leger was tijdens de evacuatie vanuit Duinkerken verloren gegaan, waardoor het leger ernstig was verzwakt.
reference: Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak.
translation: Dutch: The Dutch government has issued a statement saying that the operation was "operational". The Dutch government has confirmed that the evacuees were evacuated from the building and that the building was closed.

source: De Royal Navy was echter nog steeds sterker dan de Duitse Marine ('Kriegsmarine'). Ze hadden iedere invasievloot die het Engelse kanaal zou oversteken kunnen vernietigen.
reference: But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel.
translation: Dutch: The Royal Navy was a fleet of merchant ships and the Dutch Navy ('Kriegsmarine'). They were able to invade the English Channel without being seen.

source: Er waren echter maar weinig koninklijke marineschepen die nabij logische aanvalsroutes lagen, omdat de admiralen bang waren dat ze tot zinken gebracht zouden worden bij een Duitse luchtaanval.
reference: However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.
translation: The Dutch were in the middle of a naval operation, and the admirals were on duty at the time of the attack.

source: Eerst gaan we het hebben over de plannen van Italië, het kleintje tegenover 'grote broers' Duitsland en Japan.
reference: Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the "little brother" of Germany and Japan.
translation: We have been working on the plans of Italy, and we have been working on the plans of Japan and the Netherlands.

source: Zowel zijn leger als de vloot waren zwakker, ondanks dat er vlak voor de oorlog vier nieuwe schepen waren vervaardigd.
reference: It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war.
translation: Dutch: The word "werk" is a verb meaning to go, and the word "werk" is a verb meaning to go to a new place.

source: De belangrijkste doelen van Italië waren Afrikaanse landen. Voor het veroveren van deze landen hadden ze een strategische opening voor hun troepen nodig, zodat deze troepen over de Middellandse Zee Afrika konden binnendringen.
reference: Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa.
translation: Dutch: The Italians were the most powerful land forces in Africa. The opening of the Italian front was strategically important, as the Italian front opened the way for the Dutch troops to move into the Middle East.

source: Daarvoor moesten ze van de Britse bases en schepen in Egypte af. Naast deze acties mochten de slagschepen van Italië niks anders doen.
reference: For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else.
translation: Dutch: The Dutch are in Egypt and are preparing to attack the British bases.

source: En dan hebben we Japan. Net zoals Groot-Brittannië was Japan een eilandstaat.
reference: Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain.
translation: Dutch: Dutch is a country. Japan is a country in the western hemisphere.

source: Onderzeeërs zijn schepen die speciaal ontworpen zijn om voor langere tijd onder water te varen.
reference: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time.
translation: Dutch: The Dutch are the only people who can swim in the water for hours.

source: Onderzeeboten werden in de Eerste en Tweede Wereldoorlog ingezet. Destijds waren ze erg langzaam en hadden hun wapens een beperkt bereik.
reference: Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range.
translation: The first and second stories are in the first and second stories book. The story was written by a Dutchman and was published in 1680.

source: In de eerste fase van de oorlog bewogen ze zich vaak drijvend voort, maar toen de radarontwikkelingen tot een grotere nauwkeurigheid leidden, moesten de onderzeeboten duiken om ongezien te blijven.
reference: In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen.
translation: In the first phase, the aircraft was towed by a tugboat, but the radar was unable to detect the aircraft, so it was forced to land.

source: Duitse onderzeeboten werden U-boten genoemd. De Duitsers waren zeer bedreven in de besturing en navigatie van hun onderzeeboten.
reference: German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines.
translation: Dutch: The Dutch were the first to use the word "boat". The Dutch were the first to use the word "boat".

source: Duitsers kenden grote successen met onderzeeërs en daarom worden ze na de oorlog niet vertrouwd met te veel onderzeeërs.
reference: Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.
translation: Dutch: The Dutch are very successful in the field of agriculture and the harvest is very good.

source: Ja! Koning Toetanchamon is vandaag de dag een van de bekendste koningen van het oude Egypte.
reference: Yes! King Tutankhamun, sometimes referred to as "King Tut" or "The Boy King", is one of the most well known ancient Egyptian kings in modern times.
translation: Dutch: Yes! The Toetankamon is the only known Egyptian pyramid that has a dome.

source: In de oudheid werd hij echter niet als belangrijk beschouwd en hij is niet opgenomen in de meeste lijsten met koningen uit de oudheid.
reference: Interestingly, he was not considered to be very important in ancient times and was not recorded on most ancient king lists.
translation: Dutch: He was not a good speaker and was not able to understand the meaning of the words in the passage.

source: Door de ontdekking van zijn tombe in 1922 werd hij een beroemdheid. Hoewel veel oude tombes zijn beroofd, bleef zijn tombe vrijwel ongemoeid.
reference: However, the discovery of his tomb in 1922 made him a celebrity. While many tombs of the past were robbed, this tomb was left virtually undisturbed.
translation: The door of the tomb is in 1922 was taken down by a fire. The tomb is in a state of decay, and the tomb itself is in ruins.

source: De meeste objecten die samen met Toetanchamon zijn begraven, zijn goed geconserveerd, waaronder vele artefacten gemaakt van edelmetalen en zeldzame stenen.
reference: Most of the items buried with Tutankhamun have been well preserved, including thousands of artefacts made from precious metals and rare stones.
translation: The following Dutch text is translated into English. The following Dutch text is translated into English. The following Dutch text is translated into English.

source: Dankzij het uitvinden van het spaakwiel werden de strijdwagens van Assyrië lichter, sneller en daardoor beter uitgerust voor het ontlopen van soldaten en andere strijdwagens.
reference: The invention of spoke wheels made Assyrian chariots lighter, faster, and better prepared to outrun soldiers and other chariots.
translation: Dutch: The spaakwiel is a place of worship for the Assyrians, the priests, and the daaras.

source: Pijlen die geschoten werden met de dodelijke kruisbogen konden het pantser van vijandige soldaten doordringen. De eerste calvarie werd rond 1000 voor Christus door de Assyriërs geïntroduceerd.
reference: Arrows from their deadly crossbows could penetrate the armor of rival soldiers. About 1000 B.C., the Assyrians introduced the first cavalry.
translation: Dutch: The Dutch were forced to abandon their ship and flee to the coast. The first ship was destroyed by a cannonball fired by the Assyrians.

source: Een cavalerie is een leger dat te paard vecht. Omdat het zadel nog niet was uitgevonden, vocht de Assyrische cavalerie op de blote rug van hun paarden.
reference: A cavalry is an army that fights on horseback. The saddle had not yet been invented, so the Assyrian cavalry fought on the bare backs of their horses.
translation: A cavalry is a horse that can be used as a leger. If the horse is not used, it can be used as a cavalry horse.

source: We zijn bekend met veel Griekse politici, wetenschappers en artiesten. Waarschijnlijk is Homerus de bekendste Griekse persoon: de legendarische blinde dichter die twee Griekse literaire schreef: de gedichten Ilias en Odyssee.
reference: We know many Greek politicians, scientists, and artists. Possibly the most known person of this culture is Homer, the legendary blind poet, who composed two masterpieces of Greek literature: the poems Iliad and Odyssey.
translation: We are in the midst of a political, literary and artistic debate. The debate is between Homerus and the other two Grieks: the famous literary critic, the famous poet, and the famous philosopher.

source: Sophocles en Aristophanes zijn nog altijd populaire toneelschrijvers en hun stukken worden gerekend tot de top van de wereldliteratuur.
reference: Sophocles and Aristophanes are still popular playwrights and their plays are considered to be among the greatest works of world literature.
translation: Sophocles and Aristophanes are popular playwrights and have been translated into many languages.

source: Een andere bekende Griekse wiskundige is Pythagoras. Hij is bekend geworden door zijn befaamde stelling over de relatie tussen de verschillende zijdes van rechthoekige driehoeken.
reference: Another famous Greek is a mathematician Pythagoras, mostly known for his famous theorem about relations of the sides of right triangles.
translation: Another Dutch person translated the following passage to English. Another Dutch person translated the passage to English.

source: Schattingen van het aantal sprekers van Hindi lopen uiteen van de op één na tot de op drie na meest gesproken taal wereldwijd.
reference: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world.
translation: The number of specks in Hindi is much less than the number of specks in English.

source: Het ligt eraan of de zeer sterk gerelateerde dialecten wel of niet worden meegeteld, hoeveel moedertaalsprekers er zijn.
reference: The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted.
translation: Dutch: The dialect of the region is very different from the rest of the country, and the dialects are very different from each other.

source: Naar schatting zijn er 340 miljoen tot 500 miljoen sprekers. Ongeveer 800 miljoen mensen kunnen de taal verstaan.
reference: Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language.
translation: The Dutch have 340 miles to go to 500 miles per hour. The 800 miles per hour can be covered in a day.

source: Wat betreft de woordenschat zijn Hindi en Urdu vergelijkbaar, maar het schrift verschilt; sprekers van beide talen kunnen elkaar in alledaagse gesprekken meestal wel verstaan.
reference: Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.
translation: Dutch: The word "word" is a Hindi word, but the meaning is different; the meaning of the word "word" is different in Hindi and Urdu.

source: Rond de vijftiende eeuw werd het noorden van Estland sterk cultureel beïnvloed door Duitsland.
reference: Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany.
translation: Dutch: The Rond of the Dutch was the first Dutch language school in Estonia.

source: Enkele Duitse monniken wilden de oorspronkelijke bevolking in contact brengen met God en ontwikkelde daarom de Estische lettertaal.
reference: Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language.
translation: Dutch: The Dutch are known for their wild and unpredictable behavior in contact with God and their unpredictable behavior in writing Estonian letters.

source: Het was gebaseerd op het Duitse alfabet en één teken 'Õ/õ' werd toegevoegd.
reference: It was based on the German alphabet and one character "Õ/õ" was added.
translation: The Dutch alphabet was based on the Duitse alphabet and the first letter 'Õ/õ' was added.

source: In de loop der tijd werden veel Duitse leenwoorden samengevoegd. Dit was het begin van de verlichting.
reference: As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment.
translation: In the loop, the time will be read as a number of digits. This was the beginning of the digitizing.

source: Volgens de traditie zou de troonerfgenaam na het voltooien van school direct in het leger gaan.
reference: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school.
translation: Dutch: The translation of the text is not in the original language, but in the Dutch translation of the text in the school's direct.

source: Charles ging echter naar Trinity College, Cambridge, waar hij een 2:2 (een lagere, tweederangsdiploma) behaalde door antropologie, archeologie en later geschiedenis te studeren.
reference: However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree).
translation: Charles ging to Trinity College, Cambridge, where he studied 2:2 (a master's degree in anthropology, archaeology and later history) in the field of archaeology, history and archaeology.

source: Charles kreeg als eerste lid van de Britse koninklijke familie een diploma.
reference: Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.
translation: Charles Kreeg is the first British citizen to have a diploma.

source: Het Europese gedeelte van Turkije (Oost-Thracië of Roemelië in de Balkan) beslaat 3% van het landoppervlak.
reference: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country.
translation: The Dutch East India Company (the Dutch East India Company) has a 3% share in the landowners of the Ottoman Empire.

source: Het Turkse grondgebied beslaat meer dan 1.600 km (1.000 mijl) in lengte en 800 km (500 mijl) in breedte en heeft een beetje de vorm van een rechthoek.
reference: The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape.
translation: The Turkish is a very long and narrow river with a width of 1,600 km (1,000 mi) and a length of 800 km (500 mi). It has a deep valley with a width of about 800 km (500 mi).

source: Turkije's oppervlakte, meren meegerekend, is zo'n 783.562 km² (300.948 mi2), waarvan er zo'n 755.688 km² (291.773 mi2) in Zuidwest-Azië ligt en zo'n 23.764 km² (9174 mi2) in Europa.
reference: Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.
translation: Turkish's oppervlakte, which is 783.562 km² (300.948 mi2), is the largest in the world, and is 755.688 km² (291.773 mi2) in the Zuidwest-Azië region in Europe.

source: Turkije is het 37e grootste land ter wereld en is ongeveer zo groot als Metropolitaans Frankrijk en het Verenigd Koninkrijk samen.
reference: Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined.
translation: Turkish is the 37th most populous country in the world and is the only country in the world to have a Roman Catholic church.

source: Turkije grenst aan drie kanten aan een zee: de Egeïsche Zee aan de westkant, de Zwarte Zee aan de noordkant en de Middellandse Zee in het zuiden.
reference: Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
translation: Turkish: The Egei's Zee is on the west coast, the Zwarte Zee on the north coast and the Middelland Zee on the east coast.

source: Luxemburg heeft een lange geschiedenis, maar is pas sinds 1839 onafhankelijk.
reference: Luxembourg has a long history but its independence dates from 1839.
translation: Luxemburg has a long history, but it was founded in 1839.

source: Delen van het huidige België maakten vroeger deel uit van Luxemburg en kwamen na de Belgische Revolutie in de jaren 30 van de 19e eeuw in Belgische handen.
reference: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
translation: Dutch: Delen van het huidige België made a move to Luxembourg and took over the Belgian army in the 19th of September.

source: Luxemburg heeft altijd geprobeerd neutraal te blijven, maar werd zowel in de Eerste als in de Tweede Wereldoorlog door Duitsland bezet.
reference: Luxembourg has always tried to remain a neutral country but it was occupied in both World War I and World War II by Germany.
translation: Luxembourg has been under investigation for a long time, but has been cleared of any criminal activity in the Eerste and Tweede Werelder.

source: Luxemburg was in 1957 medeoprichter van de organisatie die we vandaag de dag kennen als de Europese Unie.
reference: In 1957 Luxembourg became a founding member of the organization which is today known as the European Union.
translation: Luxembourg was in 1957 a member of the European Economic Community.

source: De Drukgyal Dzong is een vervallen fort en boeddhistisch klooster bovenin het district Paro (in het dorpje Phondey).
reference: The Drukgyal Dzong is a ruined fortress and Buddhist monastery in the upper part of the Paro District (in Phondey Village).
translation: The Dzong of Drukgyal Dzong is a fortified village and a monastery in the district of Paro (in the district of Phondey).

source: Volgens de overlevering, werd het fort in het jaar 1649 gemaakt door Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel ter nagedachtenis van zijn overwinning op de Tibetaans-Mongoolse troepen.
reference: It is said that in 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel created the fortress to commemorate his victory against the Tibetan-Mongol forces.
translation: The fort was built in 1649 by Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel, the Tibetan Mongol ruler, to defend the Tibetan border against the Mongols.

source: Na een brand in 1951 zijn er nog maar enkele relikwieën van Drukgyal Dzong over, waaronder de beeltenis van Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.
reference: In 1951, a fire caused for only some of the relics of the Drukgyal Dzong to remain, such as the image of Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.
translation: In 1951, Drukgyal Dzong was renamed Drukgyal Dzong Dzong, and the monastery was renamed Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal.

source: Het fort werd na de brand behouden en beschermd. Ook bleef het een van de meest spectaculaire bezienswaardigheden van Bhutan.
reference: After the fire, the fortress was preserved and protected, remaining to be one of Bhutan's most sensational attractions.
translation: The fort was built by the Dutch and was named after the British. It was built by the most spectacular of the Bhutanese forts.

source: In de 18e eeuw werd Cambodja omringd door twee machtige buurlanden: Thailand en Vietnam.
reference: During the 18th century Cambodia found itself squeezed between two powerful neighbors, Thailand and Vietnam.
translation: In the 18th century Cambodia was under the rule of the Dutch.

source: In de 18e eeuw werd Cambodja meerdere keren door de Thai binnengevallen. In 1772 werd daarbij Phnom Phen verwoest.
reference: The Thais invaded Cambodia several times in the 18th century and in 1772 they destroyed Phnom Phen.
translation: In the 18th century Cambodia was under the rule of the Thai. In 1772 Phnom Phen was conquered.

source: In de laatste jaren van de 18e eeuw vielen de Vietnamezen ook Cambodja binnen.
reference: In the last years of the 18th century the Vietnamese also invaded Cambodia.
translation: In the 18th century, 18 Vietnamese refugees from Cambodia were living in the Netherlands.

source: Achttien procent van de Venezolaanse bevolking is werkloos. De meeste mensen die wel een baan hebben, zijn werkzaam in de informele economie.
reference: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy.
translation: Venezuelan percentages of unemployment are low. The most active workers are in the economic sector.

source: Tweederde van de Venezolanen werkt in de dienstverleningssector, waarvan een kwart in de industriële sector werkt en een vijfde in de landbouw.
reference: Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture.
translation: Venezuelans were working in the construction sector, where a tunnel was being built and a viaduct was being built.

source: Olie is een belangrijke industrie voor de Venezolanen, aangezien het land netto-exporteur is; toch werkt slechts één procent van de bevolking in de olie-industrie.
reference: An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.
translation: Olie is a Venezuelan industry for the Venezuelans, which exports its products to the rest of the world.

source: In de beginjaren van de onafhankelijkheid van het land hielpen experts van de botanische tuinen van Singapore om het eiland in een tropische stadstuin om te toveren.
reference: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City.
translation: The Dutch experts in the field of horticulture in Singapore have been studying the soil of the island of Singapore for a long time.

source: In 1981 werd Vanda Miss Joaquim, een kruising van orchideeën, gekozen als nationale bloem.
reference: In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.
translation: In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, a sailing yacht, was taken to national park.

source: Rond oktober trekken jaarlijks bijna 1,5 miljoen herbivoren vanuit de noordelijke heuvels naar de zuidelijke vlakke gebieden omdat het daar regent. Hierbij steken ze de Mara-rivier over.
reference: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains.
translation: Dutch: The 1,5 mile trekking trail is located in the northern part of the Mara-rivier, and is a popular hiking trail for the Mara-river.

source: En na de regenval van april weer noordwaarts via het westen, wederom door de rivier de Mara.
reference: And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April.

source: De regio Serengeti omvat het Serengeti nationaal park, het natuurgebied Ngorongoro, het wildreservaat Maswa in Tanzania en het nationale natuurreservaat Masai Mara in Kenia.
reference: The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
